Name: Funerary panel with offering list
Description: Rectangular funerary panel with offering table scene and offering list. The representations and inscriptions are in relief. The decorated surface is framed by a small raised border. On the left is the tomb owner sitting in front of an offering table, and on the right is a single horizontal line of inscription, which starts in the upper right-hand corner of the decorated surface and probably ended in front of the tomb owner's face. The tomb owner's title is preserved, his name, however, is lost.
